body:
Hey! I'm andee88 :)

I found this server a while ago when there was still Skywars, and it was my favorite gamemode. Actually, I showed my cousin cinammoncroc000 to this server. He's already a Jr. Mod (they grow up so fast :D)
I just thought I'd pop by the forums and say hello :) I guess I could do an AMA as well if you really wanted to, so AMA!
body_tagged:
